question.title: Error NoClassDefFoundError: javax/servlet/ServletContext in Intellij community
question.body:
This is my full error. I use the newest IntelliJ IDEA Community, JDK 20. When I run, it show the message below (I deleted show unnecessary code):


    com.rdsic.quan_ly_goodchild.QuanLyGoodchildApplication.main(QuanLyGoodchildApplication.java:60) ~[classes/:na]
Caused by: java.lang.IllegalStateException: Failed to introspect Class [org.springframework.web.servlet.config.annotation.WebMvcConfigurationSupport] from ClassLoader [jdk.internal.loader.ClassLoaders$AppClassLoader@76ed5528]
    
    at org.springframework.util.ReflectionUtils.getUniqueDeclaredMethods(ReflectionUtils.java:414) ~[spring-core-5.3.10.jar:5.3.10]
    
    ... 16 common frames omitted
Caused by: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: javax/servlet/ServletContext
    
    at org.springframework.util.ReflectionUtils.getDeclaredMethods(ReflectionUtils.java:463) ~[spring-core-5.3.10.jar:5.3.10]
    ... 33 common frames omitted
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: javax.servlet.ServletContext
    at java.base/jdk.internal.loader.BuiltinClassLoader.loadClass(BuiltinClassLoader.java:641) ~[na:na]
    at java.base/jdk.internal.loader.ClassLoaders$AppClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoaders.java:188) ~[na:na]
    at java.base/java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:521) ~[na:na]
    ... 37 common frames omitted

2024-01-05 17:34:18.463  WARN 14720 --- [           main] o.s.boot.SpringApplication               : Unable to close ApplicationContext

java.lang.IllegalStateException: Failed to introspect Class [org.springframework.web.servlet.config.annotation.WebMvcConfigurationSupport] from ClassLoader [jdk.internal.loader.ClassLoaders$AppClassLoader@76ed5528]


Process finished with exit code 1

Beside, there was some error with my pom.xml file:

Plugin 'org.springframework.experimental:spring-aot-maven-plugin:0.10.3' not found
Dependency org.graalvm.buildtools:junit-platform-native:${native-buildtools.version} not found
Plugin org.graalvm.buildtools:native-maven-plugin:${native-buildtools.version} not found

Edit: I downgraded my JDK to JDK 1.8 and now it's work. Thanks for your help.
